# pinecone_indexes (Data Source)

Indexes data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    pinecone = {
      source = "skyscrapr/pinecone"
    }
  }
}

provider "pinecone" {
  environment = "us-west4-gcp"
  api_key     = "var.api_key"


}

data "pinecone_index" "example" {
  name = "example-index"
}
```

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Indexes identifier
- `indexes` (List of String) Indexes
